languages.text: "Второго ткача духовный недуг одолевает, сомнением именуемый. Ужасный недуг, не страшный для мирян, но смертельный для ткачей. Ибо сомнения ткачей со стези уготованной сводят и ведут лишь к безумию кровавому. К Неумирающему ведут — раньше срока".

traits.locale_text: "Второго ткача духовный недуг одолевает, сомнением именуемый. Ужасный недуг. Ибо сомнения ткачей со стези уготованной сводят и ведут лишь к безумию кровавому. К Неумирающему ведут — раньше срока".

languages.text: "The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."
languages.original_text: "Второго ткача духовный недуг одолевает, сомнением именуемый. Ужасный недуг, не страшный для мирян, но смертельный для ткачей. Ибо сомнения ткачей со стези уготованной сводят и ведут лишь к безумию кровавому. К Неумирающему ведут — раньше срока".

traits.locale_text: "The Second Weaver is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly for a weaver. For a doubtful weaver will stray from their destined way and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

"The Second Weaver is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly for a weaver. For a doubtful weaver will stray from their destined way and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

"The Second Weaver is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly for a weaver. For a doubtful weaver will stray from their destined way and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

"The Second Weaver is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly for a weaver. For a doubtful weaver will stray from their destined way and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

"The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

"The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

languages.text: « La Deuxième tisseuse est en proie à une affection spirituelle que nous appelons le doute. Ce mal terrible, bien qu'inoffensif pour les profanes, est mortel pour nous. Car le tisseur qui doute s'écarte du fil de sa destinée et sombre dans une folie sanguinaire qui l'enverra rejoindre l'Immortel avant son heure. »
languages.original_text: "The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

traits.locale_text: « La Deuxième tisseuse est en proie à une affection spirituelle que nous appelons le doute. Ce mal terrible, bien qu'inoffensif pour les profanes, est mortel pour nous. Car le tisseur qui doute s'écarte du fil de sa destinée et sombre dans une folie sanguinaire qui l'enverra rejoindre l'Immortel avant son heure. »

languages.text: «La segunda tejedora es presa de un trastorno espiritual llamado duda. Esta espantosa dolencia es inofensiva para los laicos, pero letal para nosotros. Un tejedor que duda se desvía del hilo de su destino y sucumbe a locura sanguinaria. La duda les lleva al Inmortal antes de lo que les correspondería».
languages.original_text: "The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

traits.locale_text: «La segunda tejedora es presa de un trastorno espiritual llamado duda. Esta espantosa dolencia es inofensiva para los laicos, pero letal para nosotros. Un tejedor que duda se desvía del hilo de su destino y sucumbe a locura sanguinaria. La duda les lleva al Inmortal antes de lo que les correspondería».

languages.text: 「第二の紡ぎ手は、私たちが「疑念」と呼ぶ精神的な病に苦しんでいます。この最も恐ろしい病気は、そこらの者には無害ですが、我々にとっては致命的な病です。疑心暗鬼に陥った紡ぎ手は、運命の糸から手を離して血を求めて狂ってしまう。彼らの番が来る前に、疑心暗鬼は彼らを不死の者のもとへと連れて行くのです」
languages.original_text: "The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

traits.locale_text: 「第二の紡ぎ手は、私たちが「疑念」と呼ぶ精神的な病に苦しんでいます。この最も恐ろしい病気は、そこらの者には無害ですが、我々にとっては致命的な病です。疑心暗鬼に陥った紡ぎ手は、運命の糸から手を離して血を求めて狂ってしまう。彼らの番が来る前に、疑心暗鬼は彼らを不死の者のもとへと連れて行くのです」

languages.text: “次席织网者目前正在遭受精神折磨，这种折磨我们称之为‘怀疑’，是最为可怕的病症。尽管它不会对教外人士产生任何影响，但对我们而言，却是致命的恶疾。因为心怀犹疑的织网者必定会偏离命中注定的丝线，陷入嗜血的疯狂。他们的怀疑会让他们提前来到不死之神面前。”
languages.original_text: "The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

traits.locale_text: “次席织网者目前正在遭受精神折磨，这种折磨我们称之为‘怀疑’，是最为可怕的病症。尽管它不会对教外人士产生任何影响，但对我们而言，却是致命的恶疾。因为心怀犹疑的织网者必定会偏离命中注定的丝线，陷入嗜血的疯狂。他们的怀疑会让他们提前来到不死之神面前。”

languages.text: "Die Zweite Spinnerin wird von einer spirituellen Krankheit geplagt, die wir Zweifel nennen. Diese furchtbare Krankheit ist für Laien harmlos, für uns aber tödlich. Denn zweifelnde Spinner werden von ihrem vorbestimmten Faden abgehen und in blutrünstigem Wahnsinn versinken. Zweifel führt sie zum Todlosen, bevor ihre Zeit abgelaufen ist."
languages.original_text: "The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."

traits.locale_text: "Die Zweite Spinnerin wird von einer spirituellen Krankheit geplagt, die wir Zweifel nennen. Diese furchtbare Krankheit ist für Laien harmlos, für uns aber tödlich. Denn zweifelnde Spinner werden von ihrem vorbestimmten Faden abgehen und in blutrünstigem Wahnsinn versinken. Zweifel führt sie zum Todlosen, bevor ihre Zeit abgelaufen ist."

languages.text: "İkinci Dokur, bizim kuşku olarak adlandırdığımız ruhani bir hastalıkla cebelleşiyor. Bu dehşet dolu hastalık, avam tabakası için zararsız olsa da bizim için ölümcüldür. Zira yüreğine kuşku çökmüş bir dokur, kaderinde yazılı iplikten saparak kana susamış bir deliliğin pençesine düşer. Kuşku, bu dokurları vakitleri gelmeden önce Ölmeyen'e götürür."
languages.original_text: "The Second Spinner is in the throes of a spiritual ailment that we call doubt. This most terrible ailment, though harmless to layfolk, is deadly to us. For a doubtful spinner will stray from their destined thread and into bloodthirsty madness. Doubt brings them to the Undying One before their time."
